name: talmudist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who has studied or follows the Talmud (= the collection of ancient Jewish laws and traditions): He was a rabbi and Talmudist. Some Talmudists may say that this conclusion is incorrect.
one of the writers of the Talmud : He was a Jewish Talmudist who lived in Babylonia.
